segments.advisor_message: So, let's talk about your health status. How are you feeling currently? Any issues you’re aware of that I should know about?
segments.client_message: Oh, I'm feeling pretty good, actually! Just the usual stuff, you know? I walk pretty often, and I don't have any major health issues right now. I mean, I did have some back pain last year but it's not bad anymore.

segments.advisor_message: That’s great to hear! And about your smoking habits, I just wanted to check in. Do you smoke, and if yes, how many cigarettes do you usually have in a day?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I smoke...umm, like, half a pack a day. I've been smoking since I was, like, 18. Trying to quit, though, but it’s tough. It’s just part of my routine.

segments.advisor_message: I understand, it can be quite a challenge. Now, on a different note, have you considered how your health might impact your long-term investments?
segments.client_message: Absolutely! I think if my health stays steady, my investment choices could really grow. I'm excited about it! Just, you know, got to keep an eye on everything.
